Translations.Text: Ubutagatifu ni ubw’uwahishuriye umugaragu we (Muhamadi) igitabo gitandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma (ari cyo Qur’an), kugira ngo abe umuburizi w’ibiremwa byose
We Nyir’ubwami bw’ibirere n’isi, utarigeze agira umwana ndetse ntanagire n’umufasha mu bwami (bwe). Yanaremye buri kintu cyose kandi agiha ikigero kigikwiriye

(Abahakanyi) bishyiriyeho ibigirwa- mana bitari we (Allah), bitigeze bigira icyo birema na kimwe, ahubwo nabyo ubwabyo byararemwe. Nta kibi byakwikiza ndetse nta n’icyiza byakwimarira, kandi ntibifite ubushobozi bwo kwica cyangwa gutanga ubuzima, habe n’ubwo kuzura (abapfuye)
Abahakanye baravuze bati "Iyi (Qur’an) nta kindi iri cyo usibye kuba ari ikinyoma (Muhamadi) yahimbye abifashijwemo n’abandi bantu. Rwose (ibyo bavuga) ni bibi cyane kandi ni n’ikinyoma
Baranavuze bati "(Qur’an) ni inkuru z’abo hambere (Muhamadi) yandukuye; akaba azisomerwa mu gitondo na nimugoroba
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "(Qur’an) yahishuwe n’uzi amabanga yo mu birere n’isi (Allah). Mu by’ukuri, we ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimbabazi
Baranavuze bati "Iyi ni ntumwa ki, irya ibiryo ikanarema amasoko (nkatwe)? Kuki itamanuriwe umumalayikango ayifashe kuburira (abantu)
Cyangwa (kubera iki iyo ntumwa) itamanuriwe ubutunzi, cyangwa ngo igire umurima ikuramo amafunguro?" Kandi abahakanyi baranavuze bati "Uwo mukurikiye ntacyo ari cyo usibye kuba ari umuntu warozwe
Reba uko baguha ingero (zidafite aho zihuriye nawe)! Ahubwo barayobye, kandintibashobora kugera mu nzira (igororotse)
Ubutagatifu ni ubwe (Allah), aramutse abishatse yaguha ibyiza biruta ibyo; (yaguha) imirima itembamo imigezi (ku isi) ndetse akanaguha ingoro (zihambaye)
Nyamara bahakanye imperuka, kandi abahakanaimperuka twabateganyirije umuriro utwika
(Umuriro) nubabonera kure, bazumva ijwi ry’uburakari bwawo no kugurumana kwawo
N’igihe bazajugunywa mu nfunganwa zawo baboshye, aho ni ho bazisabira kurimbuka (ngo bakire ububabare bwawo)
(Maze babwirwe bati) "Uyu munsi mwisaba kurimbuka inshuro imwe, ahubwo nimusabe kurimbuka kenshi (kuko ntacyo biri bubamarire)
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ese uwo (muriro) ni wo mwiza, cyangwa ijuru rihoraho abatinya (Allah) basezeranyijwe ngo ribe igihembo cyabo ndetse n’iherezo ryabo (ni ryo ryiza)
Bazaribonamo ibyo bazifuza byose kandi bazabamo ubuziraherezo. Iryo ni isezerano rya Nyagasani wawe rigomba gusohora
Kandi umunsi (Allah) azabakoranyiriza hamwe n’ibyo basengaga bitari Allah, azavuga ati "Ese ni mwe mwayobeje aba bagaragu banjye, cyangwa ni bo ubwabo bayobye inzira (y’ukuri)

(Ababangikanyijwe na Allah) bazavuga bati "Ubutagatifu ni ubwawe! Ntabwo byari bikwiye ko tugira izindi mana zitari wowe, ahubwo bo n’ababyeyi babo wabahaye umunezero kugeza ubwo bibagiwe urwibutso (rwawe), nuko baba abantu barimbutse

(Ababangikanyamana bazabwirwa bati) "Rwose (ibigirwamana mwasengaga) byabanyomoje mu byo mubivugaho (ko ari byo mana zanyu), bityo ntimushobora kwikiza(ibihano) cyangwa ngo mubone ubutabazi. N’uzaramuka abangikanyije (Allah) muri mwe, tuzamusogongeza ibihano bikaze

Kandi nta ntumwa twigeze twohereza mbere yawe (yewe Muhamadi) ngo zibure kuba zararyaga ibyo kurya ndetse zikarema n’amasoko. Kandi bamwe muri mwe twabagize ibigeragezo ku bandi; esemushobora kwihangana? Kandi Nyagasani wawe ni Ubona bihebuje (buri kintu)
